channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News

item.title: “Weird Al” Yankovic Is “Bigger & Weirder” & Greater Than Ever at Madison Square Garden Concert: Review + Photos
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to laugh till you cry! "Weird Al" Yankovic slayed at Madison Square Garden 🤣🙌 #WeirdAl #ConcertReview

item.title: Watch Coldplay Surprise Perform ‘A Sky Full of Stars’ at FIFA World Cup Halftime Show
item.description: 🌟 Coldplay brought the stadium alive with 'A Sky Full of Stars' at the FIFA World Cup halftime show! Watch now! 🎶⚽ #Coldplay #FIFAWorldCup

item.title: Fontaines D.C. & Big Audio Dynamite Members Appear In Lena Dunham’s New Netflix Series Too Much
item.description: 🎸 Rockstars collide on screen! Fontaines D.C. and Big Audio Dynamite members join forces in Lena Dunham's Netflix series Too Much. 📺 #musicnews #collaboration

item.title: Drake Brought Out Vanessa Carlton For “A Thousand Miles” At Wireless Night 2
item.description: 🎶 Unexpected duet alert! Drake and Vanessa Carlton teamed up for a "A Thousand Miles" at Wireless Night 2! 🚗🎹 #MusicCollabGoals
